page.title: IAM user가 CodePipeline 만들기
page.content: 처음 세팅 Role    AWSCodeCommitFullAccess    AmazonS3FullAccess    AWSCodePipelineFullAccess    AWSCodeBuildAdminAccess            * CloudFormation 들어가자마자    Unable to list data:     User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:     cloudformation:ListStacks        * CodeBuild Rule 만들때    User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:     iam:CreateRole on resource: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:role/service-role    /code-build-sls-devops-codebuild-service-role    -> IAMFullAccess 추가        * CodePipeline Step 6: Review에서.    Could not add pipeline sls-devops as a target for Amazon CloudWatch Events rule     codepipeline-sls-de-master-160857-rule.     Failed on the following Amazon CloudWatch Events operation:     ______. This exception was returned by the operation: AccessDeniedException.    The following message contains details on the exception:     User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:     events:PutRule on resource:     arn:aws:events:ap-northeast-2:623542739657:rule/codepipeline-sls-de-master-160857-rule    …    The following message contains details on the exception:     User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:     events:PutTargets on resource:     arn:aws:events:ap-northeast-2:623542739657:rule/codepipeline-sls-de-master-160857-rule    -> inline policy : CloudWatch Events -> PutRule, PutTargets 추가
page.html:
처음 세팅 Role

AWSCodeCommitFullAccess

AmazonS3FullAccess

AWSCodePipelineFullAccess

AWSCodeBuildAdminAccess



* CloudFormation 들어가자마자

Unable to list data:

User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:

cloudformation:ListStacks


* CodeBuild Rule 만들때

User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:

iam:CreateRole on resource: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:role/service-role

/code-build-sls-devops-codebuild-service-role

-> IAMFullAccess 추가


* CodePipeline Step 6: Review에서.

Could not add pipeline sls-devops as a target for Amazon CloudWatch Events rule

codepipeline-sls-de-master-160857-rule.

Failed on the following Amazon CloudWatch Events operation:

______. This exception was returned by the operation: AccessDeniedException.

The following message contains details on the exception:

User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:

events:PutRule on resource:

arn:aws:events:ap-northeast-2:623542739657:rule/codepipeline-sls-de-master-160857-rule

…

The following message contains details on the exception:

User: arn:aws:iam::623542739657:user/awskrug is not authorized to perform:

events:PutTargets on resource:

arn:aws:events:ap-northeast-2:623542739657:rule/codepipeline-sls-de-master-160857-rule

-> inline policy : CloudWatch Events -> PutRule, PutTargets 추가
